item.title: Smart Attendance System
item.description:
Overview

An AI-powered attendance management application that automatically marks student attendance using facial recognition through a live camera feed. This project is built using Python, Flask, OpenCV, and MediaPipe, offering a seamless, contactless attendance solution.

Key Features

  • Real-time facial recognition
  • Automatic attendance marking
  • Live camera feed processing
  • Contactless solution
  • High accuracy face detection and recognition

Technology Stack

  • Languages: Python
  • Framework: Flask
  • Computer Vision: OpenCV, MediaPipe
  • AI/ML: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning

Links

  • GitHub: BhaskPand/Smart-Attendance-System

item.title: RealMeta - Museum Painting Scanner
item.description:
Overview

RealMeta is a no-login, camera-based museum painting scanner. Point your phone at a painting, capture, and get instant information. Works offline for demos, supports anonymous analytics with consent, and includes a simple guided tour queue.

Features

  • No login â€” immediate use
  • Camera capture and scan-based lookup (pHash)
  • Rich info: text + audio (with TTS fallback)
  • Guided tour queue (Next / Clear)
  • Anonymous analytics with consent modal and session UUID
  • Offline-ready via Service Worker (pre-caches core assets)

Technology Stack

  • Backend: Flask, Python
  • Computer Vision: OpenCV
  • Frontend: JavaScript, HTML, CSS
  • ML: scikit-learn
  • Other: JSON, Text-to-Speech Synthesis, phash

Skills

Flask, Python (Programming Language), OpenCV, JSON, JavaScript, Text-to-Speech Synthesis, phash, HTML, Cascading Style Sheets (CSS), scikit-learn
